1.content:
"Team Dark!" said the leader of G.U.N.

"We have just recieved info that Dr. Eggman has entered a vortex with his robots and Metal Sonic. Your orders are to follow and capture. Also, there is a scientist he is after as well. She was working on interdimensional travel when she vanished through the same vortex. Find her as well."

"Well, this will surely be a downer. Maybe I can get some jewels out of this?"said Rouge.

"Our mission is clear. Capture Eggman, get the scientist, then annialation." Said Omega.

"Let's just get this over with." said Shadow as he cocked his gun.

As all three gathered together, Shadow used his Chaos control to teleport after Eggman.

Now that you know the story, what type of media do they travel to?
1.title: The mission

11.content: Here are some options to help you get started.
11.title: Video game

111.content:
When Shadow opened his eyes, he found that he was in a space station.

"Is this the ark? No this is different."

He also noticed that Rouge and Omega weren't with him.

"We must have been seperated during teleportation. Time to investigate."

He walked around for a while till he found a strange incest like creature.

"This must be a common enemy here."

He then launched a chaos spear at it, killing the monster.

"Not even worth my time."

Then he spotted a person in a power suit.

"But that maybe."

Meanwhile

"Ugh! i can't believe we lost Shadow and worst of all, there are no gems to steal here."

"Focus on mission. Eggman robot detected. Identified as Metal Sonic."

"Perfect. We just follow the little tin can and find Eggman and leave this dreadful place."

So they persued Metal Sonic quietly into a mine.

When he stopped he found a jellyfish-like creature and captured it.

"He's just collecting specimins for Eggman. But, why?"

"Huge threat detected."

Then a huge wormlike monster rose out of the ground and attacked.
111.title: A dangerous encounter

1111.content:
He snuck behind the person for a while til it finally noticed him

"Well, you do have observations skills. Now are you human or machine?"

It did not reply.

"The silent type,huh? I like that. It makes this next part the more easier. Chaos Spear!"

The person quickly dodged it.

"Damn! Looks like your quicker then I thought. Either way. You are doomed to die. Chaos Control!"

Then time stopped all around Shadow.

He quickly delivered a stunning kick to the persons head.

"Its futile to escape my Chaos Control. Now remove the suit."

It did as Shadow said and powered down the suit reveiling itself to be a girl.

"A woman? I did not expect this to be the outcome."

Then he noticed a photo of a young girl with her parents.

As the girl tried to reactivate her suit, Shadow pulled out his gun and put it up to her forehead.

"I would gladly pull the trigger and end your pathetic life, but I won't because we have something in common. We both miss people we care about."

Then he removed the gun and walked away with the girl wondering what he meant.

Later..
Shadow kept wondering the facility when suddenly..

"HoHoHo! Well, I didn't expect to see you here Shadow. Trying to take me in? Well, fat chance. My latest creation will mop the floor with you. Egg Metroid, Go!"

Then a mechanical jellyfish-like creature came down and Eggman entered it.
1111.title: Shadow's story

1121.content: Where are they in MGS3?
1121.title: MGS3 Snake Eater

1123.content: How about the new one, Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance?
1123.title: More

115.content: Here are some more options.
115.title: more

11522.content:
"-Control!" a deep voice shouted. With a flash of light, three figures appeared on the shores of a small beach. The light faded to reveal Team Dark, blinking in the sudden sunlight. Shadow immediately raised a hand to shield his eyes from the light, squinting out over the reflective waves.

"Omega, where are we?" Rouge asked, turning to the large machine and knocking on his chest to get his attention. Omega immediately raised a hand to block her fist, lowering his head in the likeness of a disapproving glower.

"Do not do that." The robot said sternly. "Sensors are not able to connect with any GUN satellites, indicating that we have been somehow moved outside of their range."

Rouge's eyes widened in surprise. "Outside their range? But that's impossible! GUN's network covers all of Mobius!"

Shadow turned back to the others, arms crossed and a thoughtful expression on his face. "Perhaps we've been transported to another zone entirely?" the black hedgehog suggested cautiously. "I recall that Sonic has bragged about visiting such places several times." Perhaps not always directly, but the stories of the adventures tended to wind their way through the grape vine, especially since the group of so-called heroes was...surprisingly close knit, despite their seeming discord. Omega and Rouge both made gestures of agreement upon hearing the suggestion; it was far more reasonable than the idea that they had somehow found their way outside of the GUN influence.

Shadow and Rouge blinked in surprise as Omega walked past them. Noticing their pause, the robot turned back to look at them. "Standing idle is pointless," Omega said simply. "I will scout out the area. You may follow, if you wish." The robot returned his attention to the beach stretched out in front of them. "However, it is equally probably that splitting up will be a more effective use of our resources."

Rouge hummed softly, before digging a cross mark into the sand with her foot. "We'll meet back here once we're done looking around, or when we find something." She looked back up at the group. "Do our comlinks still work?"

Omega nodded. "Affirmative."

Shadow crossed his arms, looking around. "Omega can continue scouting the immediate area. Rouge, you should try and find a high place to look around. Can you manage that?"

Rouge and Omega nodded. The bat winked at Shadow. "Don't worry, hun, I'm sure I can find a good place a bit further inland."

Shadow nodded, before looking around and frowning. "I think those are the best options right now..." He turned back to the others. "I think it would be best if I went with one of you. We could finish our search faster, and then regroup."

Omega crossed his arms impatiently, but seemed content with the plan. "Affirmative. Who will you join, Shadow?"
11522.title: Wind waker

When Shadow landed, he was in a desert.

"Did my Chaos Control send me the wrong way?"

Shadow then looked along.

"Looks like I've been seperated."

He got up and looked around and saw three long legged creatures and five egg pawns in the horizon.

"Perfect. Chaos Spear!"

He launched then and destroyed them all.

"Child's play."

"That was amazing."

Shadow turned to see

14.content: Here in else, you have the option of crossing this team over with three of my favorite stories. Now which story will you select?
14.title: else

142.content:
"Where are we?" looking around, Shadow asked.

"Looks like one of Robutnik's bases." frowning, Sonic replied.

Shadow turned to Sonic and gasped. "What happened to you!?"

"Huh?" Sonic turned to Shadow and gasped. "Dude, you're... human!"

"We're all Human." raising a hand to her mouth, Amy said.

"Robutnik!" making a fist, Knuckles said. "If he thinks doing this to us is going to help him win..."

He slammed his fist down and the others shouted in surprise as the floor shook. Even Knuckles was surprised as Shadow placed a hand onto his shoulder. "Easy, old friend." softly, he said. "We'll deal with Robutnik but first, we need to find out where we are and how he did this to us."

"Actually, it was your very presence here that did it to you." a calm feminine voice said.

Everyone turned to face a small girl with long dark green hair, light green scaly skin, and blue cat like eyes. "I am Kailani, daughter of the leader of the Kraken colony."

"Kraken colony?" stepping forward, Shadow asked.

Kailani nodded. "This Robutnik had teleported you into our world, miles below the Atlantic Ocean here on Earth." softly, she said. "We sensed the teleport and immediately knew that you would not survive without adaptations." pausing, she added, "You will return to your former selves when you teleport back to your own world."

"How did you... err... adapt us?" curious, Sonic asked.

"With a Transmutation energy field." simply, Kailani replied. "However, the trick is figuring out where you came from and how to send you back as not all technologies are compatible."

"Well, where do we start?" curious, Shadow asked.

"Want a tour of my home?" smiling, Kailani asked.

Shadow smiled. "Why not."

Kailani giggled. "Try to keep up."

With that, she was running off at high speed, giggling all the way. Shadow chuckled with Sonic following. "She's in for a surprise." in unison, they said.
142.title: Into the Abyss by Scifiwizard

1421.content:
Sonic and Shadow sped down the path and easily over took Kailani who looked at therm, surprised, then giggled before running faster. "Last one to the big tree is a slow poke!" smiling, she said.

Shadow chuckled. "You are on, girl."

Far behind them, knuckles threw his fists to the ground, frustrated. Only, he then let out a yell of surprise as the move had catapulted him skywards! He easily soared over Sonic and Shadow before landing a few feet ahead of them. The three quickly stopped, surprised to see Knuckles ahead of them but they laughed as he grinned and said, "Now its a race!"

Knuckles slammed his fists down again and soared into the air as Shadow, Sonic and Kailani ran after him, laughing while Tails and Amy followed close behind.

Shadow and Sonic reached the tree at the same time and smiled as they saw Knuckles land a few seconds later with Kailani behind him and the others soon following. "You're getting faster, Knuckles." smiling, Shadow said.

Knuckles smiled in return before turning to Kailani. "Where does our tour begin?" he asked.

Kailani turned to a hatch. "Through here." she said.

Shadow walked through the hatch and saw....
1421.title: continue.

14211.content:
"It- It looks just like Mobotropolis." stunned, Shadow said.

"It does." stunned as well, Sonic agreed. "It looks exactly like the city before Robutnik took over."

Kailani giggled. "Robutnik?" amused she asked. "That's a funny name."

"He's the last person you want in your world, believe me." serious, Knuckles said.

"Um... is there any place in that city where I can get a chilli dog?"

Kailani smiled. "Just everywhere." motioning the others to follow. "Come on, I'll even buy."

"I can't argue with that!" running through the hatch, Sonic said.

Moments later, the group was all sitting by a fountain, each enjoying a chilli dog. "Man, it's been too long since I had one of these!" smiling, Shadow said. "It tastes good."

"So, what makes this (giggle) Robutnik character so evil where you come from?"
14211.title: An underground city.

142112.content:
"I can explain this. Dr. Ivo Robotnik is a mad scientist bent on world domination."

"World domination? How exactly?" Kailani asked.

"He creates machines and robots that are meant to destroy and conquer cities."

"So he's a really big threat, huh?"

"You have no idea, kid. He's always got some new scheme up his sleeve." Knuckles said.

"He is nothing but disgusting trash that needs to be destroyed."

"Why do you hate him so much, Shadow?"

"Its because Shadow was created by his grandfather."

"What?"
142112.title: Shadow explains.

info.brief_description: Shadow the hedgehog and friends travel into different genres.
info.description:
This is an crossover interactive featuring team dark.

the main characters are shadow the hedgehog(speed), Rouge the bat(flight), and E-123 Omega(power. the main villainx are Dr. Eggman and Metal Sonic.

Rules

no killing uless it is any villain except dr. eggman
no sex
no gore, but you can mention blood
